episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_0300: C’mon, Dad! Let’s go do that one next!
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_0700: Maybe I shouldn’t have come here after all...
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_0800: I’m not very good at having fun like those two.
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_0900:
There’s no such thing as being good or bad
at having fun!
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_1000:
And as an experienced festival-goer myself,
I’d be happy to teach you if there’s anything
you don’t understand!
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_1300: But I’ve really got no clue about these things.
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_1500:
That fluffy stuff that looks like Cottonee’s cotton...
I’ve never seen that before.
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_1600:
Oh, that? That’s cotton candy! It’s a yummy treat
that melts in your mouth the second you eat it!
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_1700:
I see. And what about those round things shaped
like Applin and Munna?
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_1800:
Those are candy apples. They’re whole apples
coated with supersweet candy!
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_2000:
Festivals are just full of fun and tasty things
like that!
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_2100: I’ll teach you all about them, N!
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_2300:
Hilbert! If you don’t hurry up,
we’ll leave you behind!
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_2500:
Heh. Hilda sure is gung ho about this
festival thing...
episode_event_summer_2022/4001_1001_2600: But it looks like N’s having fun with her around.
episode_event_summer_2022/4201_1031_0100:
Our goal is to visit every
single stall at the festival!
episode_event_summer_2022/4201_1001_0100:
Are you ready, you two?! Make sure you’re
focused and prepared to give it your all!
episode_event_summer_2022/4201_1001_0200:
Do you really have to focus and prepare that much
just to have fun at a festival?
episode_event_summer_2022/4201_1001_0300:
Of course, silly! Figuring out how to maximize
your pocket money to have the most fun is
super important!
episode_event_summer_2022/4201_1001_0400:
So we give it our all in battles, and we should
also do the same when we’re having fun?
episode_event_summer_2022/4201_1001_0500: Exactly! So come on—let’s get going!
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_0100: I’m definitely gonna get a winner this time!
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_0200:
Haha, nice try! Here’s a potion as a
consolation prize.
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_0300: Aw, c’mon! Three duds in a row...
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_0400: C’mon, Hilda. Enough Pokémon lottery already.
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_0500:
I see... So if you get a winner, you can
get prizes like Pokémon plushies.
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_0600: I’d like to give it a try.
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_0700: Sure! Just don’t expect to win on your first—
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_0800:
Whoa, congratulations, dude! You’ve won the
second prize—a set of Pokémon plushies!
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1000: Seriously? You won in one try?!
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1100:
Did you want a prize, Hilda? You can have one
of these plushies, if you like.
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1200:
Nah. It’s not as fun if you don’t win it on
your own!
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1300:
As long as I have the will to win, I’m sure this
next one will be a winner!
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1400: Now, Sirfetch’d! Take up your fighting stance!
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1500: Was that Bea’s voice I heard just now?
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1600: She must be having a battle somewhere.
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1800: I wanna battle, too! Let’s find her, quick!
episode_event_summer_2022/4002_1001_1900: Ack! Hilda, wait up! What about the lottery?
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_0100:
Hey, who were you just battling? Where’s
your opponent? Where’d they go?!
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_0200:
Oh, are you here because you heard
Bea shouting?
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_0400:
Lyra told me that people dance at summer
festivals, so I was practicing for that.
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_0500:
I thought I’d incorporate some Galar karate into
my dancing.
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_0600:
Yeah! Dancing is the perfect finale for a summer
festival. It’s a whole event in itself!
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_0700: Aw, so it wasn’t a battle after all...
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_0800:
But now that I think about it, a summer festival
dance might also be pretty fun!
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_1100:
Yeah, she’s from the Egg you gave me before!
The little Clobbopus that hatched from it sure has
grown up!
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_1200:
I can tell you’ve taken good care of her.
She’s truly a fine Grapploct.
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_1400:
By the way, do you wanna see how strong
we’ve gotten?
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_1500:
Yes. As a matter of fact, that’s precisely what I
was thinking just now.
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_1800:
Wow, Hilda’s already battling! She sure has a lot
of energy.
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_1900: She really seems to be enjoying herself.
episode_event_summer_2022/4003_1001_2000: Hilda shines the brightest when she’s battling.
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_0100: I wonder where Hilda went, anyway.
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_0200: She might’ve gotten more sync pairs to battle her.
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_0500:
My plan was to come right back after I finished
that battle with Bea...
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_0600:
But then I got distracted by this really cool stall
with a target practice game and lost track
of time.
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_0700: Yup, sounds like something you’d do.
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_0800: I can just imagine your giddy face as you played.
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_0900: Hey! Stop treating me like a kid, you two!
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1000:
I mean... I guess it is true that I’ve been the one
getting the most excited about all the games and
stuff, but still...
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1100:
Anyway, check out these prizes I won! Here, I got
one for each of you!
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1200:
Oh, is this a pendant? There’s a little rock attached
to it.
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1300:
Yeah! They’re replicas of these things called
wishing stars!
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1400:
Apparently, they’re these special rocks from Galar!
They’re said to grant wishes!
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1500: And now all three of us have one!
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1600:
Let’s keep them as mementos of the fun
we’re having today at this festival!
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1700:
My wish will be for us to become even
better friends!
episode_event_summer_2022/4004_1001_1800: Thanks, Hilda. I’ll take good care of this.
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_0100: This is such a lovely gift.
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_0200: I’ll have to get you something in return.
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_0300: Hm? Those rocks you’ve got there...
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_0400: I won them at the target practice game!
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_0500:
They’re wishing star replicas. The three of us
are going to keep them as mementos of this
fun summer festival!
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_0800:
Not at all! Even if they’re replicas, those rocks are
now full of all your feelings.
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_0900:
Because of that, they shine just as bright as the
real thing.
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_1100:
Do you know much about stones?
If so, I have a question for you.
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_1200:
I'm wondering what kind of stone I should get for
Hilda in return. I’d like to get her something that
will make her happy.
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_1300:
Hm... Well, Hilda’s always bright and strong, so
I think a Sun Stone or a Shiny Stone would be
great for her! Or maybe—
episode_event_summer_2022/4005_1001_1400: Step right up! It’s time for a special game!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_0100: We should go over there and teach them a lesson!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_0200:
Wait, Hilda! Maybe we shouldn’t be so quick to
pick a fight with them.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_0300:
By all appearances, they’re just operating a
festival stall.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_0400:
Why don’t we keep an eye on what they’re doing,
just in case?
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_0500: If you say so... I guess I’ll stand down.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_0800:
All you have to do is select the two Poké Balls
that have Pokémon inside them out of four!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_0900:
Remember, only TWO have Pokémon in them.
The other two are empty!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_1000:
Since two out of four have Pokémon inside,
you have a 50 percent chance of winning!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_1100:
If you’re able to find the Poké Balls with Pokémon
in them twice in a row, we’ll give you a
Mythical Pokémon!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_1200: Hm... I mean, they’re calling it a game, but...
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_1300: They’re giving out Pokémon as prizes?
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_1500:
Don’t forget, this is your chance to win yourself
a Mythical Pokémon!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_1600:
Of course, there’s a price to participate. The entry
fee is any type of treasure you’ve got on hand!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_1700: OK, I’ll give it a whirl!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_1900: Hey, you! Hurry up and lay out the Poké Balls!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_2200: I think this one looks like a winner!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_2300: And my second choice is...this one!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_2500: Too bad! You didn’t find the Pokémon!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_2900: Sure! Go ahead, make a line!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_3000:
Oh, what a shame... You almost had it!
Great job finding that first Pokémon, though!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_3200:
Now, we’ll be keeping these treasures we
collected from you, as was agreed!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_3400:
That’s weird... If the probability of finding both
Pokémon is 50 percent, why isn’t anyone winning?
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_3500: Because the probability isn’t really 50 percent.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_3700:
The 50 percent probability only applies to the
first guess, where two out of the four options
are correct.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_3800:
But on the second guess, you’ve got three options,
and only one is a winner. So the probability of
selecting that winner is just one in three.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_3900:
If you calculate the overall probability of picking
a Pokémon twice in a row, the odds are actually
one in six.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_4000: What?! That’s not even close to 50 percent!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_4100:
Yeah. Plus, it looks like there’s another reason
why nobody’s winning.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_4200: Make sure you set them out CORRECTLY. Got it?
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_4500: He just swapped out one of the balls!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_4600:
They took away one of the winning Poké Balls!
It’s impossible to win now!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_4700: That’s some dirty, rotten cheating right there!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_4800:
Yeah...but if we try to point that out, I’m sure
they’ll play dumb.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_4900:
As long as nobody notices their tricks, they can
just keep taking advantage of people!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_5000:
They’re using this festival to cheat people out of
their precious treasures! How could anyone stoop
so low?!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_5100:
Do we really have to just stand here and
watch this?
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_5200:
Ugh! This is so frustrating! Isn’t there something
we can do?!
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_5300: Hmm, there might be something. I have an idea.
episode_event_summer_2022/4006_1001_5500:
Sometimes you have to fight foul play with some
foul play of your own.
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_0400: And what treasure will you be offering?
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_0600: A pendant with a rock on it?
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_0700:
It just looks like a rock. Is this thing
actually valuable?
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_1100: Hm... I’ll start with that one.
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_1200:
Well done! Your first guess is correct! But we’ll
see about the next one...
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_1800:
We only put one correct ball there in the first
place, so there’s no way you could’ve—
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_1900: Huh? What did you say just now?!
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2000:
Uh... Oh, I mean, no! That was just, uh...a figure
of speech!
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2100: That means it was impossible to win!
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2200:
That’s right. The way he was usually setting it up,
there was no possible way to win.
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2300:
And yet, for some reason, you put two correct
balls out in front of me...
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2400:
Why would you do that? Were you distracted by
some sort of illusion?
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2500: What would an illusion have to do with—
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2600:
Ohhh, I get it now. Zoroark can make people
see illusions!
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2800: I’d say that goes for you as well.
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_2900:
At any rate, the game’s over. Now if you’d just
return the treasure I—
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_3000: Shut up! Here’s your trashy treasure!
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_3300:
N! I’ve had enough of this! Let’s take down Team
Break together!
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_3500:
You think YOU’VE had enough? What about us?!
Hey, you! Get over here!
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_3600:
If it’s three we’re up against, then I’m joining
you two!
episode_event_summer_2022/4007_1001_3700:
Let’s go! The three of us together’ll really teach
’em a lesson!
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_0300:
Now you’re gonna give back every single treasure
you took from people here. You got that?!
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_0400:
And about that Mythical Pokémon you claimed to
have as a prize...
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_0500:
That was just a lie to get people to play
the game!
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_0600: We haven’t caught any Mythical Pokémon!
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_0700: *sigh* I thought that was probably the case.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_0800:
I’ve had enough of your lies! If you try anything
awful like this again...
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_1100: I’d love to battle with you all myself sometime.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_1400: I’m so sorry, Hilda. The present you gave me—it...
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_1500: Oh, you don’t need to worry for my sake.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_1700: The only thing they broke was that pendant.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_1800: They can’t break our memories, you know?
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_1900:
Instead of a pendant, let’s just etch today’s
memories into our hearts!
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_2200: But now it’s going to end.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_2300: I wasn’t finished enjoying the festival...
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_2400: I think we already enjoyed it quite a bit.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_2500: But I wanted to hang out with you two even more!
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_2800:
I’m sure today’s memories will live on forever in
my heart. That’s how beautiful this is.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_2900:
When you first invited me to the summer festival,
I thought I should refuse because I didn’t
really know how to properly enjoy one.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_3000:
I felt guilty that I wouldn’t be able to truly enjoy it
with you.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_3100:
But both of you were so kind to me, Hilda and
Hilbert. I had a wonderful time with you tonight.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_3200: That really was fun. Thank you for inviting me.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_3300: I’ll never forget the moments we shared today.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_3600: And...I don’t want it to end with just tonight.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_3700:
I hope I can go to another summer festival again
with you two.
episode_event_summer_2022/4008_1001_3800:
And we’ll make more memories just as fun as the
ones we made today.
